title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 15
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

Despite almost 4,000 metres of climbing, there was minimal GC action on stage 15. Adam Yates attacked the group late on gaining 15 seconds, but Odd Christian Eiking retains the red jersey.

1. Odd Christian Eiking
2. Guillaume Martin +0:54
3. Primož Roglič +1:36
4. Enric Mas +2:11
5. Miguel Angel Lopez +3:04
6. Jack Haig +3:35
7. Egan Bernal +4:21
8. Adam Yates +4:34
